                              <div class="line">Continue in my liking? nay, gave notice</div>
                              <div class="line">He was from thence discharged. Sir, call to mind</div>
                              <div class="line">That I have been your wife, in this obedience,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upward of twenty years, and have been blest</div>
                              <div class="line">With many children by you: if, in the course</div>
                              <div class="line">And process of this time, you can report,</div>
                              <div class="line">And prove it too, against mine honour aught,</div>
                              <div class="line">My bond to wedlock, or my love and duty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Against your sacred person, in God's name,</div>
                              <div class="line">Turn me away; and let the foul'st contempt</div>
                              <div class="line">Shut door upon me, and so give me up</div>
                              <div class="line">To the sharp'st kind of justice. Please you sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">The king, your father, was reputed for</div>
                              <div class="line">A prince most prudent, of an excellent</div>
                              <div class="line">And unmatch'd wit and judgment: Ferdinand,</div>
                              <div class="line">My father, king of Spain, was reckon'd one</div>
                              <div class="line">The wisest prince that there had reign'd by many</div>
                              <div class="line">A year before: it is not to be question'd</div>
                              <div class="line">That they had gather'd a wise council to them</div>
                              <div class="line">Of every realm, that did debate this business,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who deem'd our marriage lawful: wherefore I humbly</div>
                              <div class="line">Beseech you, sir, to spare me, till I may</div>
                              <div class="line">Be by my friends in Spain advised; whose counsel</div>
                              <div class="line">I will implore: if not, i' the name of God,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your pleasure be fulfill'd!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">You have here, lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">And of your choice, these reverend fathers; men</div>
                              <div class="line">Of singular integrity and learning,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, the elect o' the land, who are assembled</div>
                              <div class="line">To plead your cause: it shall be therefore bootless</div>
                              <div class="line">That longer you desire the court; as well</div>
                              <div class="line">For your own quiet, as to rectify</div>
                              <div class="line">What is unsettled in the king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">His grace</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath spoken well and justly: therefore, madam,</div>
                              <div class="line">It's fit this royal session do proceed;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that, without delay, their arguments</div>
                              <div class="line">Be now produced and heard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord cardinal,</div>
                              <div class="line">To you I speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Your pleasure, madam?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am about to weep; but, thinking that</div>
                              <div class="line">We are a queen, or long have dream'd so, certain</div>
                              <div class="line">The daughter of a king, my drops of tears</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll turn to sparks of fire.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Be patient yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">I will, when you are humble; nay, before,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or God will punish me. I do believe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Induced by potent circumstances, that</div>
                              <div class="line">You are mine enemy, and make my challenge</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall not be my judge: for it is you</div>
                              <div class="line">Have blown this coal betwixt my lord and me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which God's dew quench! Therefore I say again,</div>
                              <div class="line">I utterly abhor, yea, from my soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Refuse you for my judge; whom, yet once more,</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold my most malicious foe, and think not</div>
                              <div class="line">At all a friend to truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">I do profess</div>
                              <div class="line">You speak not like yourself; who ever yet</div>
                              <div class="line">Have stood to charity, and display'd the effects</div>
                              <div class="line">Of disposition gentle, and of wisdom</div>
                              <div class="line">O'ertopping woman's power. Madam, you do me wrong:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no spleen against you; nor injustice</div>
                              <div class="line">For you or any: how far I have proceeded,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or how far further shall, is warranted</div>
                              <div class="line">By a commission from the consistory,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, the whole consistory of Rome. You charge me</div>
                              <div class="line">That I have blown this coal: I do deny it:</div>
                              <div class="line">The king is present: if it be known to him</div>
                              <div class="line">That I gainsay my deed, how may he wound,</div>
                              <div class="line">And worthily, my falsehood! yea, as much</div>
                              <div class="line">As you have done my truth. If he know</div>
                              <div class="line">That I am free of your report, he knows</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not of your wrong. Therefore in him</div>
                              <div class="line">It lies to cure me: and the cure is, to</div>
                              <div class="line">Remove these thoughts from you: the which before</div>
                              <div class="line">His highness shall speak in, I do beseech</div>
                              <div class="line">You, gracious madam, to unthink your speaking</div>
                              <div class="line">And to say so no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a simple woman, much too weak</div>
                              <div class="line">To oppose your cunning. You're meek and</div>
                              <div class="line">humble-mouth'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">You sign your place and calling, in full seeming,</div>
                              <div class="line">With meekness and humility; but your heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Is cramm'd with arrogancy, spleen, and pride.</div>
                              <div class="line">You have, by fortune and his highness' favours,</div>
                              <div class="line">Gone slightly o'er low steps and now are mounted</div>
                              <div class="line">Where powers are your retainers, and your words,</div>
                              <div class="line">Domestics to you, serve your will as't please</div>
                              <div class="line">Yourself pronounce their office. I must tell you,</div>
                              <div class="line">You tender more your person's honour than</div>
                              <div class="line">Your high profession spiritual: that again</div>
                              <div class="line">I do refuse you for my judge; and here,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before you all, appeal unto the pope,</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring my whole cause 'fore his holiness,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to be judged by him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>She curtsies to KING HENRY VIII, and offers to depart</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The queen is obstinate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stubborn to justice, apt to accuse it, and</div>
                              <div class="line">Disdainful to be tried by't: 'tis not well.</div>
                              <div class="line">She's going away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Call her again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Crier</div>
                              <div class="line">Katharine Queen of England, come into the court.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, you are call'd back.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">What need you note it? pray you, keep your way:</div>
                              <div class="line">When you are call'd, return. Now, the Lord help,</div>
                              <div class="line">They vex me past my patience! Pray you, pass on:</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not tarry; no, nor ever more</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon this business my appearance make</div>
                              <div class="line">In any of their courts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt QUEEN KATHARINE and her Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Go thy ways, Kate:</div>
                              <div class="line">That man i' the world who shall report he has</div>
                              <div class="line">A better wife, let him in nought be trusted,</div>
                              <div class="line">For speaking false in that: thou art, alone,</div>
                              <div class="line">If thy rare qualities, sweet gentleness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy meekness saint-like, wife-like government,</div>
                              <div class="line">Obeying in commanding, and thy parts</div>
                              <div class="line">Sovereign and pious else, could speak thee out,</div>
                              <div class="line">The queen of earthly queens: she's noble born;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, like her true nobility, she has</div>
                              <div class="line">Carried herself towards me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Most gracious sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">In humblest manner I require your highness,</div>
                              <div class="line">That it shall please you to declare, in hearing</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all these ears,--for where I am robb'd and bound,</div>
                              <div class="line">There must I be unloosed, although not there</div>
                              <div class="line">At once and fully satisfied,--whether ever I</div>
                              <div class="line">Did broach this business to your highness; or</div>
                              <div class="line">Laid any scruple in your way, which might</div>
                              <div class="line">Induce you to the question on't? or ever</div>
                              <div class="line">Have to you, but with thanks to God for such</div>
                              <div class="line">A royal lady, spake one the least word that might</div>
                              <div class="line">Be to the prejudice of her present state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or touch of her good person?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord cardinal,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do excuse you; yea, upon mine honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">I free you from't. You are not to be taught</div>
                              <div class="line">That you have many enemies, that know not</div>
                              <div class="line">Why they are so, but, like to village-curs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bark when their fellows do: by some of these</div>
                              <div class="line">The queen is put in anger. You're excused:</div>
                              <div class="line">But will you be more justified? You ever</div>
                              <div class="line">Have wish'd the sleeping of this business; never desired</div>
                              <div class="line">It to be stirr'd; but oft have hinder'd, oft,</div>
                              <div class="line">The passages made toward it: on my honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">I speak my good lord cardinal to this point,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thus far clear him. Now, what moved me to't,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be bold with time and your attention:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then mark the inducement. Thus it came; give heed to't:</div>
                              <div class="line">My conscience first received a tenderness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Scruple, and prick, on certain speeches utter'd</div>
                              <div class="line">By the Bishop of Bayonne, then French ambassador;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who had been hither sent on the debating</div>
                              <div class="line">A marriage 'twixt the Duke of Orleans and</div>
                              <div class="line">Our daughter Mary: i' the progress of this business,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere a determinate resolution, he,</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean the bishop, did require a respite;</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein he might the king his lord advertise</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether our daughter were legitimate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Respecting this our marriage with the dowager,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sometimes our brother's wife. This respite shook</div>
                              <div class="line">The bosom of my conscience, enter'd me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, with a splitting power, and made to tremble</div>
                              <div class="line">The region of my breast; which forced such way,</div>
                              <div class="line">That many mazed considerings did throng</div>
                              <div class="line">And press'd in with this caution. First, methought</div>
                              <div class="line">I stood not in the smile of heaven; who had</div>
                              <div class="line">Commanded nature, that my lady's womb,</div>
                              <div class="line">If it conceived a male child by me, should</div>
                              <div class="line">Do no more offices of life to't than</div>
                              <div class="line">The grave does to the dead; for her male issue</div>
                              <div class="line">Or died where they were made, or shortly after</div>
                              <div class="line">This world had air'd them: hence I took a thought,</div>
                              <div class="line">This was a judgment on me; that my kingdom,</div>
                              <div class="line">Well worthy the best heir o' the world, should not</div>
                              <div class="line">Be gladded in't by me: then follows, that</div>
                              <div class="line">I weigh'd the danger which my realms stood in</div>
                              <div class="line">By this my issue's fail; and that gave to me</div>
                              <div class="line">Many a groaning throe. Thus hulling in</div>
                              <div class="line">The wild sea of my conscience, I did steer</div>
                              <div class="line">Toward this remedy, whereupon we are</div>
                              <div class="line">Now present here together: that's to say,</div>
                              <div class="line">I meant to rectify my conscience,--which</div>
                              <div class="line">I then did feel full sick, and yet not well,--</div>
                              <div class="line">By all the reverend fathers of the land</div>
                              <div class="line">And doctors learn'd: first I began in private</div>
                              <div class="line">With you, my Lord of Lincoln; you remember</div>
                              <div class="line">How under my oppression I did reek,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I first moved you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LINCOLN</div>
                              <div class="line">Very well, my liege.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">I have spoke long: be pleased yourself to say</div>
                              <div class="line">How far you satisfied me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LINCOLN</div>
                              <div class="line">So please your highness,</div>
                              <div class="line">The question did at first so stagger me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bearing a state of mighty moment in't</div>
                              <div class="line">And consequence of dread, that I committed</div>
                              <div class="line">The daring'st counsel which I had to doubt;</div>
                              <div class="line">And did entreat your highness to this course</div>
                              <div class="line">Which you are running here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">I then moved you,</div>
                              <div class="line">My Lord of Canterbury; and got your leave</div>
                              <div class="line">To make this present summons: unsolicited</div>
                              <div class="line">I left no reverend person in this court;</div>
                              <div class="line">But by particular consent proceeded</div>
                              <div class="line">Under your hands and seals: therefore, go on:</div>
                              <div class="line">For no dislike i' the world against the person</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the good queen, but the sharp thorny points</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my alleged reasons, drive this forward:</div>
                              <div class="line">Prove but our marriage lawful, by my life</div>
                              <div class="line">And kingly dignity, we are contented</div>
                              <div class="line">To wear our mortal state to come with her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Katharine our queen, before the primest creature</div>
                              <div class="line">That's paragon'd o' the world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So please your highness,</div>
                              <div class="line">The queen being absent, 'tis a needful fitness</div>
                              <div class="line">That we adjourn this court till further day:</div>
                              <div class="line">Meanwhile must be an earnest motion</div>
                              <div class="line">Made to the queen, to call back her appeal</div>
                              <div class="line">She intends unto his holiness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> I may perceive</div>
                              <div class="line">These cardinals trifle with me: I abhor</div>
                              <div class="line">This dilatory sloth and tricks of Rome.</div>
                              <div class="line">My learn'd and well-beloved servant, Cranmer,</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, return: with thy approach, I know,</div>
                              <div class="line">My comfort comes along. Break up the court:</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, set on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt in manner as they entered</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  London. QUEEN KATHARINE's apartments.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  Ante-chamber to KING HENRY VIII's apartment.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  London. QUEEN KATHARINE's apartments.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter QUEEN KATHARINE and her Women, as at work</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Take thy lute, wench: my soul grows sad with troubles;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sing, and disperse 'em, if thou canst: leave working.</div>
                              <p>SONG</p>
                              <div class="line">Orpheus with his lute made trees,</div>
                              <div class="line">And the mountain tops that freeze,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bow themselves when he did sing:</div>
                              <div class="line">To his music plants and flowers</div>
                              <div class="line">Ever sprung; as sun and showers</div>
                              <div class="line">There had made a lasting spring.</div>
                              <div class="line">Every thing that heard him play,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even the billows of the sea,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hung their heads, and then lay by.</div>
                              <div class="line">In sweet music is such art,</div>
                              <div class="line">Killing care and grief of heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Fall asleep, or hearing, die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Gentleman</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">How now!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">An't please your grace, the two great cardinals</div>
                              <div class="line">Wait in the presence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Would they speak with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">They will'd me say so, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray their graces</div>
                              <div class="line">To come near.</div>
                              <p>Exit Gentleman</p>
                              <div class="line">What can be their business</div>
                              <div class="line">With me, a poor weak woman, fall'n from favour?</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not like their coming. Now I think on't,</div>
                              <div class="line">They should be good men; their affairs as righteous:</div>
                              <div class="line">But all hoods make not monks.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CARDINAL WOLSEY and CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace to your highness!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Your graces find me here part of a housewife,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would be all, against the worst may happen.</div>
                              <div class="line">What are your pleasures with me, reverend lords?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">May it please you noble madam, to withdraw</div>
                              <div class="line">Into your private chamber, we shall give you</div>
                              <div class="line">The full cause of our coming.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak it here:</div>
                              <div class="line">There's nothing I have done yet, o' my conscience,</div>
                              <div class="line">Deserves a corner: would all other women</div>
                              <div class="line">Could speak this with as free a soul as I do!</div>
                              <div class="line">My lords, I care not, so much I am happy</div>
                              <div class="line">Above a number, if my actions</div>
                              <div class="line">Were tried by every tongue, every eye saw 'em,</div>
                              <div class="line">Envy and base opinion set against 'em,</div>
                              <div class="line">I know my life so even. If your business</div>
                              <div class="line">Seek me out, and that way I am wife in,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out with it boldly: truth loves open dealing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Tanta est erga te mentis integritas, regina</div>
                              <div class="line">serenissima,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, good my lord, no Latin;</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not such a truant since my coming,</div>
                              <div class="line">As not to know the language I have lived in:</div>
                              <div class="line">A strange tongue makes my cause more strange,</div>
                              <div class="line">suspicious;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, speak in English: here are some will thank you,</div>
                              <div class="line">If you speak truth, for their poor mistress' sake;</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe me, she has had much wrong: lord cardinal,</div>
                              <div class="line">The willing'st sin I ever yet committed</div>
                              <div class="line">May be absolved in English.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry my integrity should breed,</div>
                              <div class="line">And service to his majesty and you,</div>
                              <div class="line">So deep suspicion, where all faith was meant.</div>
                              <div class="line">We come not by the way of accusation,</div>
                              <div class="line">To taint that honour every good tongue blesses,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor to betray you any way to sorrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">You have too much, good lady; but to know</div>
                              <div class="line">How you stand minded in the weighty difference</div>
                              <div class="line">Between the king and you; and to deliver,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like free and honest men, our just opinions</div>
                              <div class="line">And comforts to your cause.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Most honour'd madam,</div>
                              <div class="line">My Lord of York, out of his noble nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Zeal and obedience he still bore your grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Forgetting, like a good man your late censure</div>
                              <div class="line">Both of his truth and him, which was too far,</div>
                              <div class="line">Offers, as I do, in a sign of peace,</div>
                              <div class="line">His service and his counsel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> To betray me.--</div>
                              <div class="line">My lords, I thank you both for your good wills;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye speak like honest men; pray God, ye prove so!</div>
                              <div class="line">But how to make ye suddenly an answer,</div>
                              <div class="line">In such a point of weight, so near mine honour,--</div>
                              <div class="line">More near my life, I fear,--with my weak wit,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to such men of gravity and learning,</div>
                              <div class="line">In truth, I know not. I was set at work</div>
                              <div class="line">Among my maids: full little, God knows, looking</div>
                              <div class="line">Either for such men or such business.</div>
                              <div class="line">For her sake that I have been,--for I feel</div>
                              <div class="line">The last fit of my greatness,--good your graces,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me have time and counsel for my cause:</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, I am a woman, friendless, hopeless!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, you wrong the king's love with these fears:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your hopes and friends are infinite.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">In England</div>
                              <div class="line">But little for my profit: can you think, lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">That any Englishman dare give me counsel?</div>
                              <div class="line">Or be a known friend, 'gainst his highness' pleasure,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though he be grown so desperate to be honest,</div>
                              <div class="line">And live a subject? Nay, forsooth, my friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">They that must weigh out my afflictions,</div>
                              <div class="line">They that my trust must grow to, live not here:</div>
                              <div class="line">They are, as all my other comforts, far hence</div>
                              <div class="line">In mine own country, lords.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I would your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">Would leave your griefs, and take my counsel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">How, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Put your main cause into the king's protection;</div>
                              <div class="line">He's loving and most gracious: 'twill be much</div>
                              <div class="line">Both for your honour better and your cause;</div>
                              <div class="line">For if the trial of the law o'ertake ye,</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll part away disgraced.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">He tells you rightly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye tell me what ye wish for both,--my ruin:</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this your Christian counsel? out upon ye!</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven is above all yet; there sits a judge</div>
                              <div class="line">That no king can corrupt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Your rage mistakes us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">The more shame for ye: holy men I thought ye,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my soul, two reverend cardinal virtues;</div>
                              <div class="line">But cardinal sins and hollow hearts I fear ye:</div>
                              <div class="line">Mend 'em, for shame, my lords. Is this your comfort?</div>
                              <div class="line">The cordial that ye bring a wretched lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">A woman lost among ye, laugh'd at, scorn'd?</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not wish ye half my miseries;</div>
                              <div class="line">I have more charity: but say, I warn'd ye;</div>
                              <div class="line">Take heed, for heaven's sake, take heed, lest at once</div>
                              <div class="line">The burthen of my sorrows fall upon ye.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, this is a mere distraction;</div>
                              <div class="line">You turn the good we offer into envy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye turn me into nothing: woe upon ye</div>
                              <div class="line">And all such false professors! would you have me--</div>
                              <div class="line">If you have any justice, any pity;</div>
                              <div class="line">If ye be any thing but churchmen's habits--</div>
                              <div class="line">Put my sick cause into his hands that hates me?</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, has banish'd me his bed already,</div>
                              <div class="line">His love, too long ago! I am old, my lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the fellowship I hold now with him</div>
                              <div class="line">Is only my obedience. What can happen</div>
                              <div class="line">To me above this wretchedness? all your studies</div>
                              <div class="line">Make me a curse like this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Your fears are worse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I lived thus long--let me speak myself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since virtue finds no friends--a wife, a true one?</div>
                              <div class="line">A woman, I dare say without vain-glory,</div>
                              <div class="line">Never yet branded with suspicion?</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I with all my full affections</div>
                              <div class="line">Still met the king? loved him next heaven?</div>
                              <div class="line">obey'd him?</div>
                              <div class="line">Been, out of fondness, superstitious to him?</div>
                              <div class="line">Almost forgot my prayers to content him?</div>
                              <div class="line">And am I thus rewarded? 'tis not well, lords.</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring me a constant woman to her husband,</div>
                              <div class="line">One that ne'er dream'd a joy beyond his pleasure;</div>
                              <div class="line">And to that woman, when she has done most,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet will I add an honour, a great patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, you wander from the good we aim at.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I dare not make myself so guilty,</div>
                              <div class="line">To give up willingly that noble title</div>
                              <div class="line">Your master wed me to: nothing but death</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall e'er divorce my dignities.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, hear me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I had never trod this English earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or felt the flatteries that grow upon it!</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye have angels' faces, but heaven knows your hearts.</div>
                              <div class="line">What will become of me now, wretched lady!</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the most unhappy woman living.</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, poor wenches, where are now your fortunes!</div>
                              <div class="line">Shipwreck'd upon a kingdom, where no pity,</div>
                              <div class="line">No friend, no hope; no kindred weep for me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Almost no grave allow'd me: like the lily,</div>
                              <div class="line">That once was mistress of the field and flourish'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll hang my head and perish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">If your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">Could but be brought to know our ends are honest,</div>
                              <div class="line">You'ld feel more comfort: why should we, good lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon what cause, wrong you? alas, our places,</div>
                              <div class="line">The way of our profession is against it:</div>
                              <div class="line">We are to cure such sorrows, not to sow 'em.</div>
                              <div class="line">For goodness' sake, consider what you do;</div>
                              <div class="line">How you may hurt yourself, ay, utterly</div>
                              <div class="line">Grow from the king's acquaintance, by this carriage.</div>
                              <div class="line">The hearts of princes kiss obedience,</div>
                              <div class="line">So much they love it; but to stubborn spirits</div>
                              <div class="line">They swell, and grow as terrible as storms.</div>
                              <div class="line">I know you have a gentle, noble temper,</div>
                              <div class="line">A soul as even as a calm: pray, think us</div>
                              <div class="line">Those we profess, peace-makers, friends, and servants.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL CAMPEIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, you'll find it so. You wrong your virtues</div>
                              <div class="line">With these weak women's fears: a noble spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">As yours was put into you, ever casts</div>
                              <div class="line">Such doubts, as false coin, from it. The king loves you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Beware you lose it not: for us, if you please</div>
                              <div class="line">To trust us in your business, we are ready</div>
                              <div class="line">To use our utmost studies in your service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Do what ye will, my lords: and, pray, forgive me,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I have used myself unmannerly;</div>
                              <div class="line">You know I am a woman, lacking wit</div>
                              <div class="line">To make a seemly answer to such persons.</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, do my service to his majesty:</div>
                              <div class="line">He has my heart yet; and shall have my prayers</div>
                              <div class="line">While I shall have my life. Come, reverend fathers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bestow your counsels on me: she now begs,</div>
                              <div class="line">That little thought, when she set footing here,</div>
                              <div class="line">She should have bought her dignities so dear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Ante-chamber to KING HENRY VIII's apartment.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter NORFOLK, SUFFOLK, SURREY, and Chamberlain</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">If you will now unite in your complaints,</div>
                              <div class="line">And force them with a constancy, the cardinal</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot stand under them: if you omit</div>
                              <div class="line">The offer of this time, I cannot promise</div>
                              <div class="line">But that you shall sustain moe new disgraces,</div>
                              <div class="line">With these you bear already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">I am joyful</div>
                              <div class="line">To meet the least occasion that may give me</div>
                              <div class="line">Remembrance of my father-in-law, the duke,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be revenged on him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Which of the peers</div>
                              <div class="line">Have uncontemn'd gone by him, or at least</div>
                              <div class="line">Strangely neglected? when did he regard</div>
                              <div class="line">The stamp of nobleness in any person</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of himself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">My lords, you speak your pleasures:</div>
                              <div class="line">What he deserves of you and me I know;</div>
                              <div class="line">What we can do to him, though now the time</div>
                              <div class="line">Gives way to us, I much fear. If you cannot</div>
                              <div class="line">Bar his access to the king, never attempt</div>
                              <div class="line">Any thing on him; for he hath a witchcraft</div>
                              <div class="line">Over the king in's tongue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">O, fear him not;</div>
                              <div class="line">His spell in that is out: the king hath found</div>
                              <div class="line">Matter against him that for ever mars</div>
                              <div class="line">The honey of his language. No, he's settled,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to come off, in his displeasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">I should be glad to hear such news as this</div>
                              <div class="line">Once every hour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe it, this is true:</div>
                              <div class="line">In the divorce his contrary proceedings</div>
                              <div class="line">Are all unfolded wherein he appears</div>
                              <div class="line">As I would wish mine enemy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">How came</div>
                              <div class="line">His practises to light?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Most strangely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">O, how, how?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">The cardinal's letters to the pope miscarried,</div>
                              <div class="line">And came to the eye o' the king: wherein was read,</div>
                              <div class="line">How that the cardinal did entreat his holiness</div>
                              <div class="line">To stay the judgment o' the divorce; for if</div>
                              <div class="line">It did take place, 'I do,' quoth he, 'perceive</div>
                              <div class="line">My king is tangled in affection to</div>
                              <div class="line">A creature of the queen's, Lady Anne Bullen.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">Has the king this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">Will this work?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">The king in this perceives him, how he coasts</div>
                              <div class="line">And hedges his own way. But in this point</div>
                              <div class="line">All his tricks founder, and he brings his physic</div>
                              <div class="line">After his patient's death: the king already</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath married the fair lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">Would he had!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">May you be happy in your wish, my lord</div>
                              <div class="line">For, I profess, you have it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, all my joy</div>
                              <div class="line">Trace the conjunction!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">My amen to't!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">All men's!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">There's order given for her coronation:</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, this is yet but young, and may be left</div>
                              <div class="line">To some ears unrecounted. But, my lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">She is a gallant creature, and complete</div>
                              <div class="line">In mind and feature: I persuade me, from her</div>
                              <div class="line">Will fall some blessing to this land, which shall</div>
                              <div class="line">In it be memorised.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">But, will the king</div>
                              <div class="line">Digest this letter of the cardinal's?</div>
                              <div class="line">The Lord forbid!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, amen!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no;</div>
                              <div class="line">There be moe wasps that buzz about his nose</div>
                              <div class="line">Will make this sting the sooner. Cardinal Campeius</div>
                              <div class="line">Is stol'n away to Rome; hath ta'en no leave;</div>
                              <div class="line">Has left the cause o' the king unhandled; and</div>
                              <div class="line">Is posted, as the agent of our cardinal,</div>
                              <div class="line">To second all his plot. I do assure you</div>
                              <div class="line">The king cried Ha! at this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, God incense him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let him cry Ha! louder!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">But, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">When returns Cranmer?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">He is return'd in his opinions; which</div>
                              <div class="line">Have satisfied the king for his divorce,</div>
                              <div class="line">Together with all famous colleges</div>
                              <div class="line">Almost in Christendom: shortly, I believe,</div>
                              <div class="line">His second marriage shall be publish'd, and</div>
                              <div class="line">Her coronation. Katharine no more</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be call'd queen, but princess dowager</div>
                              <div class="line">And widow to Prince Arthur.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">This same Cranmer's</div>
                              <div class="line">A worthy fellow, and hath ta'en much pain</div>
                              <div class="line">In the king's business.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">He has; and we shall see him</div>
                              <div class="line">For it an archbishop.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">So I hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis so.</div>
                              <div class="line">The cardinal!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CARDINAL WOLSEY and CROMWELL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Observe, observe, he's moody.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">The packet, Cromwell.</div>
                              <div class="line">Gave't you the king?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CROMWELL</div>
                              <div class="line">To his own hand, in's bedchamber.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Look'd he o' the inside of the paper?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CROMWELL</div>
                              <div class="line">Presently</div>
                              <div class="line">He did unseal them: and the first he view'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">He did it with a serious mind; a heed</div>
                              <div class="line">Was in his countenance. You he bade</div>
                              <div class="line">Attend him here this morning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he ready</div>
                              <div class="line">To come abroad?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CROMWELL</div>
                              <div class="line">I think, by this he is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave me awhile.</div>
                              <p>Exit CROMWELL</p>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">It shall be to the Duchess of Alencon,</div>
                              <div class="line">The French king's sister: he shall marry her.</div>
                              <div class="line">Anne Bullen! No; I'll no Anne Bullens for him:</div>
                              <div class="line">There's more in't than fair visage. Bullen!</div>
                              <div class="line">No, we'll no Bullens. Speedily I wish</div>
                              <div class="line">To hear from Rome. The Marchioness of Pembroke!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">He's discontented.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">May be, he hears the king</div>
                              <div class="line">Does whet his anger to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sharp enough,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord, for thy justice!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL WOLSEY</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  The late queen's gentlewoman,</div>
                              <div class="line">a knight's daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be her mistress' mistress! the queen's queen!</div>
                              <div class="line">This candle burns not clear: 'tis I must snuff it;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then out it goes. What though I know her virtuous</div>
                              <div class="line">And well deserving? yet I know her for</div>
                              <div class="line">A spleeny Lutheran; and not wholesome to</div>
                              <div class="line">Our cause, that she should lie i' the bosom of</div>
                              <div class="line">Our hard-ruled king. Again, there is sprung up</div>
                              <div class="line">An heretic, an arch one, Cranmer; one</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath crawl'd into the favour of the king,</div>
                              <div class="line">And is his oracle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">He is vex'd at something.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SURREY</div>
                              <div class="line">I would 'twere something that would fret the string,</div>
                              <div class="line">The master-cord on's heart!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter KING HENRY VIII, reading of a schedule, and LOVELL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">The king, the king!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">What piles of wealth hath he accumulated</div>
                              <div class="line">To his own portion! and what expense by the hour</div>
                              <div class="line">Seems to flow from him! How, i' the name of thrift,</div>
                              <div class="line">Does he rake this together! Now, my lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">Saw you the cardinal?</div>
