                              <div class="line">My legs, like loaden branches, bow to the earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Willing to leave their burthen. Reach a chair:</div>
                              <div class="line">So; now, methinks, I feel a little ease.</div>
                              <div class="line">Didst thou not tell me, Griffith, as thou led'st me,</div>
                              <div class="line">That the great child of honour, Cardinal Wolsey, Was dead?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, madam; but I think your grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of the pain you suffer'd, gave no ear to't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, good Griffith, tell me how he died:</div>
                              <div class="line">If well, he stepp'd before me, happily</div>
                              <div class="line">For my example.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, the voice goes, madam:</div>
                              <div class="line">For after the stout Earl Northumberland</div>
                              <div class="line">Arrested him at York, and brought him forward,</div>
                              <div class="line">As a man sorely tainted, to his answer,</div>
                              <div class="line">He fell sick suddenly, and grew so ill</div>
                              <div class="line">He could not sit his mule.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, poor man!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">At last, with easy roads, he came to Leicester,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lodged in the abbey; where the reverend abbot,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all his covent, honourably received him;</div>
                              <div class="line">To whom he gave these words, 'O, father abbot,</div>
                              <div class="line">An old man, broken with the storms of state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is come to lay his weary bones among ye;</div>
                              <div class="line">Give him a little earth for charity!'</div>
                              <div class="line">So went to bed; where eagerly his sickness</div>
                              <div class="line">Pursued him still: and, three nights after this,</div>
                              <div class="line">About the hour of eight, which he himself</div>
                              <div class="line">Foretold should be his last, full of repentance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Continual meditations, tears, and sorrows,</div>
                              <div class="line">He gave his honours to the world again,</div>
                              <div class="line">His blessed part to heaven, and slept in peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">So may he rest; his faults lie gently on him!</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet thus far, Griffith, give me leave to speak him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet with charity. He was a man</div>
                              <div class="line">Of an unbounded stomach, ever ranking</div>
                              <div class="line">Himself with princes; one that, by suggestion,</div>
                              <div class="line">Tied all the kingdom: simony was fair-play;</div>
                              <div class="line">His own opinion was his law: i' the presence</div>
                              <div class="line">He would say untruths; and be ever double</div>
                              <div class="line">Both in his words and meaning: he was never,</div>
                              <div class="line">But where he meant to ruin, pitiful:</div>
                              <div class="line">His promises were, as he then was, mighty;</div>
                              <div class="line">But his performance, as he is now, nothing:</div>
                              <div class="line">Of his own body he was ill, and gave</div>
                              <div class="line">The clergy in example.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble madam,</div>
                              <div class="line">Men's evil manners live in brass; their virtues</div>
                              <div class="line">We write in water. May it please your highness</div>
                              <div class="line">To hear me speak his good now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, good Griffith;</div>
                              <div class="line">I were malicious else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">This cardinal,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though from an humble stock, undoubtedly</div>
                              <div class="line">Was fashion'd to much honour from his cradle.</div>
                              <div class="line">He was a scholar, and a ripe and good one;</div>
                              <div class="line">Exceeding wise, fair-spoken, and persuading:</div>
                              <div class="line">Lofty and sour to them that loved him not;</div>
                              <div class="line">But to those men that sought him sweet as summer.</div>
                              <div class="line">And though he were unsatisfied in getting,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which was a sin, yet in bestowing, madam,</div>
                              <div class="line">He was most princely: ever witness for him</div>
                              <div class="line">Those twins Of learning that he raised in you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ipswich and Oxford! one of which fell with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unwilling to outlive the good that did it;</div>
                              <div class="line">The other, though unfinish'd, yet so famous,</div>
                              <div class="line">So excellent in art, and still so rising,</div>
                              <div class="line">That Christendom shall ever speak his virtue.</div>
                              <div class="line">His overthrow heap'd happiness upon him;</div>
                              <div class="line">For then, and not till then, he felt himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">And found the blessedness of being little:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, to add greater honours to his age</div>
                              <div class="line">Than man could give him, he died fearing God.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">After my death I wish no other herald,</div>
                              <div class="line">No other speaker of my living actions,</div>
                              <div class="line">To keep mine honour from corruption,</div>
                              <div class="line">But such an honest chronicler as Griffith.</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom I most hated living, thou hast made me,</div>
                              <div class="line">With thy religious truth and modesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now in his ashes honour: peace be with him!</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience, be near me still; and set me lower:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have not long to trouble thee. Good Griffith,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cause the musicians play me that sad note</div>
                              <div class="line">I named my knell, whilst I sit meditating</div>
                              <div class="line">On that celestial harmony I go to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Sad and solemn music</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">She is asleep: good wench, let's sit down quiet,</div>
                              <div class="line">For fear we wake her: softly, gentle Patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>The vision. Enter, solemnly tripping one after
another, six personages, clad in white robes,
wearing on their heads garlands of bays, and golden
vizards on their faces; branches of bays or palm in
their hands. They first congee unto her, then
dance; and, at certain changes, the first two hold
a spare garland over her head; at which the other
four make reverent curtsies; then the two that held
the garland deliver the same to the other next two,
who observe the same order in their changes, and
holding the garland over her head: which done,
they deliver the same garland to the last two, who
likewise observe the same order: at which, as it
were by inspiration, she makes in her sleep signs
of rejoicing, and holdeth up her hands to heaven:
and so in their dancing vanish, carrying the
garland with them. The music continues</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Spirits of peace, where are ye? are ye all gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">And leave me here in wretchedness behind ye?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, we are here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not you I call for:</div>
                              <div class="line">Saw ye none enter since I slept?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">None, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">No? Saw you not, even now, a blessed troop</div>
                              <div class="line">Invite me to a banquet; whose bright faces</div>
                              <div class="line">Cast thousand beams upon me, like the sun?</div>
                              <div class="line">They promised me eternal happiness;</div>
                              <div class="line">And brought me garlands, Griffith, which I feel</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not worthy yet to wear: I shall, assuredly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">I am most joyful, madam, such good dreams</div>
                              <div class="line">Possess your fancy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid the music leave,</div>
                              <div class="line">They are harsh and heavy to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Music ceases</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATIENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you note</div>
                              <div class="line">How much her grace is alter'd on the sudden?</div>
                              <div class="line">How long her face is drawn? how pale she looks,</div>
                              <div class="line">And of an earthy cold? Mark her eyes!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">She is going, wench: pray, pray.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATIENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven comfort her!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">An't like your grace,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">You are a saucy fellow:</div>
                              <div class="line">Deserve we no more reverence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRIFFITH</div>
                              <div class="line">You are to blame,</div>
                              <div class="line">Knowing she will not lose her wonted greatness,</div>
                              <div class="line">To use so rude behavior; go to, kneel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">I humbly do entreat your highness' pardon;</div>
                              <div class="line">My haste made me unmannerly. There is staying</div>
                              <div class="line">A gentleman, sent from the king, to see you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Admit him entrance, Griffith: but this fellow</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me ne'er see again.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt GRIFFITH and Messenger</p>
                              <p>Re-enter GRIFFITH, with CAPUCIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">If my sight fail not,</div>
                              <div class="line">You should be lord ambassador from the emperor,</div>
                              <div class="line">My royal nephew, and your name Capucius.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPUCIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, the same; your servant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">The times and titles now are alter'd strangely</div>
                              <div class="line">With me since first you knew me. But, I pray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your pleasure with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPUCIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">First mine own service to your grace; the next,</div>
                              <div class="line">The king's request that I would visit you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who grieves much for your weakness, and by me</div>
                              <div class="line">Sends you his princely commendations,</div>
                              <div class="line">And heartily entreats you take good comfort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">O my good lord, that comfort comes too late;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis like a pardon after execution:</div>
                              <div class="line">That gentle physic, given in time, had cured me;</div>
                              <div class="line">But now I am past an comforts here, but prayers.</div>
                              <div class="line">How does his highness?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPUCIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, in good health.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">So may he ever do! and ever flourish,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I shall dwell with worms, and my poor name</div>
                              <div class="line">Banish'd the kingdom! Patience, is that letter,</div>
                              <div class="line">I caused you write, yet sent away?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATIENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Giving it to KATHARINE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I most humbly pray you to deliver</div>
                              <div class="line">This to my lord the king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPUCIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Most willing, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">In which I have commended to his goodness</div>
                              <div class="line">The model of our chaste loves, his young daughter;</div>
                              <div class="line">The dews of heaven fall thick in blessings on her!</div>
                              <div class="line">Beseeching him to give her virtuous breeding--</div>
                              <div class="line">She is young, and of a noble modest nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope she will deserve well,--and a little</div>
                              <div class="line">To love her for her mother's sake, that loved him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven knows how dearly. My next poor petition</div>
                              <div class="line">Is, that his noble grace would have some pity</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my wretched women, that so long</div>
                              <div class="line">Have follow'd both my fortunes faithfully:</div>
                              <div class="line">Of which there is not one, I dare avow,</div>
                              <div class="line">And now I should not lie, but will deserve</div>
                              <div class="line">For virtue and true beauty of the soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">For honesty and decent carriage,</div>
                              <div class="line">A right good husband, let him be a noble</div>
                              <div class="line">And, sure, those men are happy that shall have 'em.</div>
                              <div class="line">The last is, for my men; they are the poorest,</div>
                              <div class="line">But poverty could never draw 'em from me;</div>
                              <div class="line">That they may have their wages duly paid 'em,</div>
                              <div class="line">And something over to remember me by:</div>
                              <div class="line">If heaven had pleased to have given me longer life</div>
                              <div class="line">And able means, we had not parted thus.</div>
                              <div class="line">These are the whole contents: and, good my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">By that you love the dearest in this world,</div>
                              <div class="line">As you wish Christian peace to souls departed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand these poor people's friend, and urge the king</div>
                              <div class="line">To do me this last right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPUCIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, I will,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or let me lose the fashion of a man!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, honest lord. Remember me</div>
                              <div class="line">In all humility unto his highness:</div>
                              <div class="line">Say his long trouble now is passing</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of this world; tell him, in death I bless'd him,</div>
                              <div class="line">For so I will. Mine eyes grow dim. Farewell,</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord. Griffith, farewell. Nay, Patience,</div>
                              <div class="line">You must not leave me yet: I must to bed;</div>
                              <div class="line">Call in more women. When I am dead, good wench,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me be used with honour: strew me over</div>
                              <div class="line">With maiden flowers, that all the world may know</div>
                              <div class="line">I was a chaste wife to my grave: embalm me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Then lay me forth: although unqueen'd, yet like</div>
                              <div class="line">A queen, and daughter to a king, inter me.</div>
                              <div class="line">I can no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt, leading KATHARINE</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.8">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.2">1. SCENE I.  London. A gallery in the palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.3">2. SCENE II.  Before the council-chamber. Pursuivants, Pages, &c. attending.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.4">3. SCENE III.  The Council-Chamber.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.5">4. SCENE IV.  The palace yard.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.6">5. SCENE V.  The palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.7">6. EPILOGUE</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  London. A gallery in the palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter GARDINER, Bishop of Winchester, a Page with a
torch before him, met by LOVELL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">It's one o'clock, boy, is't not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boy</div>
                              <div class="line">It hath struck.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">These should be hours for necessities,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not for delights; times to repair our nature</div>
                              <div class="line">With comforting repose, and not for us</div>
                              <div class="line">To waste these times. Good hour of night, Sir Thomas!</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither so late?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">Came you from the king, my lord</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">I did, Sir Thomas: and left him at primero</div>
                              <div class="line">With the Duke of Suffolk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">I must to him too,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before he go to bed. I'll take my leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">Not yet, Sir Thomas Lovell. What's the matter?</div>
                              <div class="line">It seems you are in haste: an if there be</div>
                              <div class="line">No great offence belongs to't, give your friend</div>
                              <div class="line">Some touch of your late business: affairs, that walk,</div>
                              <div class="line">As they say spirits do, at midnight, have</div>
                              <div class="line">In them a wilder nature than the business</div>
                              <div class="line">That seeks dispatch by day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I love you;</div>
                              <div class="line">And durst commend a secret to your ear</div>
                              <div class="line">Much weightier than this work. The queen's in labour,</div>
                              <div class="line">They say, in great extremity; and fear'd</div>
                              <div class="line">She'll with the labour end.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">The fruit she goes with</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray for heartily, that it may find</div>
                              <div class="line">Good time, and live: but for the stock, Sir Thomas,</div>
                              <div class="line">I wish it grubb'd up now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks I could</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry the amen; and yet my conscience says</div>
                              <div class="line">She's a good creature, and, sweet lady, does</div>
                              <div class="line">Deserve our better wishes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">But, sir, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me, Sir Thomas: you're a gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Of mine own way; I know you wise, religious;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, let me tell you, it will ne'er be well,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twill not, Sir Thomas Lovell, take't of me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till Cranmer, Cromwell, her two hands, and she,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sleep in their graves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, sir, you speak of two</div>
                              <div class="line">The most remark'd i' the kingdom. As for Cromwell,</div>
                              <div class="line">Beside that of the jewel house, is made master</div>
                              <div class="line">O' the rolls, and the king's secretary; further, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stands in the gap and trade of moe preferments,</div>
                              <div class="line">With which the time will load him. The archbishop</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the king's hand and tongue; and who dare speak</div>
                              <div class="line">One syllable against him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, yes, Sir Thomas,</div>
                              <div class="line">There are that dare; and I myself have ventured</div>
                              <div class="line">To speak my mind of him: and indeed this day,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I may tell it you, I think I have</div>
                              <div class="line">Incensed the lords o' the council, that he is,</div>
                              <div class="line">For so I know he is, they know he is,</div>
                              <div class="line">A most arch heretic, a pestilence</div>
                              <div class="line">That does infect the land: with which they moved</div>
                              <div class="line">Have broken with the king; who hath so far</div>
                              <div class="line">Given ear to our complaint, of his great grace</div>
                              <div class="line">And princely care foreseeing those fell mischiefs</div>
                              <div class="line">Our reasons laid before him, hath commanded</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow morning to the council-board</div>
                              <div class="line">He be convented. He's a rank weed, Sir Thomas,</div>
                              <div class="line">And we must root him out. From your affairs</div>
                              <div class="line">I hinder you too long: good night, Sir Thomas.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">Many good nights, my lord: I rest your servant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt GARDINER and Page</p>
                        <p>Enter KING HENRY VIII and SUFFOLK</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Charles, I will play no more tonight;</div>
                              <div class="line">My mind's not on't; you are too hard for me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I did never win of you before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">But little, Charles;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor shall not, when my fancy's on my play.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Lovell, from the queen what is the news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">I could not personally deliver to her</div>
                              <div class="line">What you commanded me, but by her woman</div>
                              <div class="line">I sent your message; who return'd her thanks</div>
                              <div class="line">In the great'st humbleness, and desired your highness</div>
                              <div class="line">Most heartily to pray for her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">What say'st thou, ha?</div>
                              <div class="line">To pray for her? what, is she crying out?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">So said her woman; and that her sufferance made</div>
                              <div class="line">Almost each pang a death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, good lady!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">God safely quit her of her burthen, and</div>
                              <div class="line">With gentle travail, to the gladding of</div>
                              <div class="line">Your highness with an heir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis midnight, Charles;</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, to bed; and in thy prayers remember</div>
                              <div class="line">The estate of my poor queen. Leave me alone;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I must think of that which company</div>
                              <div class="line">Would not be friendly to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">I wish your highness</div>
                              <div class="line">A quiet night; and my good mistress will</div>
                              <div class="line">Remember in my prayers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Charles, good night.</div>
                              <p>Exit SUFFOLK</p>
                              <p>Enter DENNY</p>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, what follows?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DENNY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I have brought my lord the archbishop,</div>
                              <div class="line">As you commanded me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! Canterbury?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DENNY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true: where is he, Denny?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DENNY</div>
                              <div class="line">He attends your highness' pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit DENNY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  This is about that which the bishop spake:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am happily come hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter DENNY, with CRANMER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Avoid the gallery.</div>
                              <p>LOVELL seems to stay</p>
                              <div class="line">Ha! I have said. Be gone. What!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt LOVELL and DENNY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">I am fearful: wherefore frowns he thus?</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis his aspect of terror. All's not well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my lord! you desire to know</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore I sent for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Kneeling</span>              It is my duty</div>
                              <div class="line">To attend your highness' pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, arise,</div>
                              <div class="line">My good and gracious Lord of Canterbury.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, you and I must walk a turn together;</div>
                              <div class="line">I have news to tell you: come, come, give me your hand.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, my good lord, I grieve at what I speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">And am right sorry to repeat what follows</div>
                              <div class="line">I have, and most unwillingly, of late</div>
                              <div class="line">Heard many grievous, I do say, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Grievous complaints of you; which, being consider'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have moved us and our council, that you shall</div>
                              <div class="line">This morning come before us; where, I know,</div>
                              <div class="line">You cannot with such freedom purge yourself,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that, till further trial in those charges</div>
                              <div class="line">Which will require your answer, you must take</div>
                              <div class="line">Your patience to you, and be well contented</div>
                              <div class="line">To make your house our Tower: you a brother of us,</div>
                              <div class="line">It fits we thus proceed, or else no witness</div>
                              <div class="line">Would come against you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Kneeling</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">I humbly thank your highness;</div>
                              <div class="line">And am right glad to catch this good occasion</div>
                              <div class="line">Most throughly to be winnow'd, where my chaff</div>
                              <div class="line">And corn shall fly asunder: for, I know,</div>
                              <div class="line">There's none stands under more calumnious tongues</div>
                              <div class="line">Than I myself, poor man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand up, good Canterbury:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy truth and thy integrity is rooted</div>
                              <div class="line">In us, thy friend: give me thy hand, stand up:</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, let's walk. Now, by my holidame.</div>
                              <div class="line">What manner of man are you? My lord, I look'd</div>
                              <div class="line">You would have given me your petition, that</div>
                              <div class="line">I should have ta'en some pains to bring together</div>
                              <div class="line">Yourself and your accusers; and to have heard you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without indurance, further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">Most dread liege,</div>
                              <div class="line">The good I stand on is my truth and honesty:</div>
                              <div class="line">If they shall fail, I, with mine enemies,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will triumph o'er my person; which I weigh not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being of those virtues vacant. I fear nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">What can be said against me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you not</div>
                              <div class="line">How your state stands i' the world, with the whole world?</div>
                              <div class="line">Your enemies are many, and not small; their practises</div>
                              <div class="line">Must bear the same proportion; and not ever</div>
                              <div class="line">The justice and the truth o' the question carries</div>
                              <div class="line">The due o' the verdict with it: at what ease</div>
                              <div class="line">Might corrupt minds procure knaves as corrupt</div>
                              <div class="line">To swear against you? such things have been done.</div>
                              <div class="line">You are potently opposed; and with a malice</div>
                              <div class="line">Of as great size. Ween you of better luck,</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean, in perjured witness, than your master,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose minister you are, whiles here he lived</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon this naughty earth? Go to, go to;</div>
                              <div class="line">You take a precipice for no leap of danger,</div>
                              <div class="line">And woo your own destruction.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">God and your majesty</div>
                              <div class="line">Protect mine innocence, or I fall into</div>
                              <div class="line">The trap is laid for me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Be of good cheer;</div>
                              <div class="line">They shall no more prevail than we give way to.</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep comfort to you; and this morning see</div>
                              <div class="line">You do appear before them: if they shall chance,</div>
                              <div class="line">In charging you with matters, to commit you,</div>
                              <div class="line">The best persuasions to the contrary</div>
                              <div class="line">Fail not to use, and with what vehemency</div>
                              <div class="line">The occasion shall instruct you: if entreaties</div>
                              <div class="line">Will render you no remedy, this ring</div>
                              <div class="line">Deliver them, and your appeal to us</div>
                              <div class="line">There make before them. Look, the good man weeps!</div>
                              <div class="line">He's honest, on mine honour. God's blest mother!</div>
                              <div class="line">I swear he is true--hearted; and a soul</div>
                              <div class="line">None better in my kingdom. Get you gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">And do as I have bid you.</div>
                              <p>Exit CRANMER</p>
                              <div class="line">He has strangled</div>
                              <div class="line">His language in his tears.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Old Lady, LOVELL following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>                 Come back: what mean you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Lady</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll not come back; the tidings that I bring</div>
                              <div class="line">Will make my boldness manners. Now, good angels</div>
                              <div class="line">Fly o'er thy royal head, and shade thy person</div>
                              <div class="line">Under their blessed wings!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by thy looks</div>
                              <div class="line">I guess thy message. Is the queen deliver'd?</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, ay; and of a boy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Lady</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, ay, my liege;</div>
                              <div class="line">And of a lovely boy: the God of heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">Both now and ever bless her! 'tis a girl,</div>
                              <div class="line">Promises boys hereafter. Sir, your queen</div>
                              <div class="line">Desires your visitation, and to be</div>
                              <div class="line">Acquainted with this stranger 'tis as like you</div>
                              <div class="line">As cherry is to cherry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Lovell!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LOVELL</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Give her an hundred marks. I'll to the queen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Lady</div>
                              <div class="line">An hundred marks! By this light, I'll ha' more.</div>
                              <div class="line">An ordinary groom is for such payment.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will have more, or scold it out of him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Said I for this, the girl was like to him?</div>
                              <div class="line">I will have more, or else unsay't; and now,</div>
                              <div class="line">While it is hot, I'll put it to the issue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Before the council-chamber. Pursuivants, Pages, &c. attending.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter CRANMER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope I am not too late; and yet the gentleman,</div>
                              <div class="line">That was sent to me from the council, pray'd me</div>
                              <div class="line">To make great haste. All fast? what means this? Ho!</div>
                              <div class="line">Who waits there? Sure, you know me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Keeper</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Keeper</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, my lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet I cannot help you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">Why?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DOCTOR BUTTS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Keeper</div>
                              <div class="line">Your grace must wait till you be call'd for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">So.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR BUTTS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  This is a piece of malice. I am glad</div>
                              <div class="line">I came this way so happily: the king</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall understand it presently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> 'Tis Butts,</div>
                              <div class="line">The king's physician: as he pass'd along,</div>
                              <div class="line">How earnestly he cast his eyes upon me!</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray heaven, he sound not my disgrace! For certain,</div>
                              <div class="line">This is of purpose laid by some that hate me--</div>
                              <div class="line">God turn their hearts! I never sought their malice--</div>
                              <div class="line">To quench mine honour: they would shame to make me</div>
                              <div class="line">Wait else at door, a fellow-counsellor,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Mong boys, grooms, and lackeys. But their pleasures</div>
                              <div class="line">Must be fulfill'd, and I attend with patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter the KING HENRY VIII and DOCTOR BUTTS at a window above</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR BUTTS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll show your grace the strangest sight--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">What's that, Butts?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR BUTTS</div>
                              <div class="line">I think your highness saw this many a day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Body o' me, where is it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR BUTTS</div>
                              <div class="line">There, my lord:</div>
                              <div class="line">The high promotion of his grace of Canterbury;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who holds his state at door, 'mongst pursuivants,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pages, and footboys.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VIII</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! 'tis he, indeed:</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the honour they do one another?</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis well there's one above 'em yet. I had thought</div>
                              <div class="line">They had parted so much honesty among 'em</div>
                              <div class="line">At least, good manners, as not thus to suffer</div>
                              <div class="line">A man of his place, and so near our favour,</div>
                              <div class="line">To dance attendance on their lordships' pleasures,</div>
                              <div class="line">And at the door too, like a post with packets.</div>
                              <div class="line">By holy Mary, Butts, there's knavery:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let 'em alone, and draw the curtain close:</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall hear more anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  The Council-Chamber.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Chancellor; places himself at the upper end
of the table on the left hand; a seat being left
void above him, as for CRANMER's seat. SUFFOLK,
NORFOLK, SURREY, Chamberlain, GARDINER, seat
themselves in order on each side. CROMWELL at
lower end, as secretary. Keeper at the door</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chancellor</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak to the business, master-secretary:</div>
                              <div class="line">Why are we met in council?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CROMWELL</div>
                              <div class="line">Please your honours,</div>
                              <div class="line">The chief cause concerns his grace of Canterbury.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">Has he had knowledge of it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CROMWELL</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Who waits there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Keeper</div>
                              <div class="line">Without, my noble lords?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Keeper</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord archbishop;</div>
                              <div class="line">And has done half an hour, to know your pleasures.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chancellor</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him come in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Keeper</div>
                              <div class="line">Your grace may enter now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>CRANMER enters and approaches the council-table</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chancellor</div>
                              <div class="line">My good lord archbishop, I'm very sorry</div>
                              <div class="line">To sit here at this present, and behold</div>
                              <div class="line">That chair stand empty: but we all are men,</div>
                              <div class="line">In our own natures frail, and capable</div>
                              <div class="line">Of our flesh; few are angels: out of which frailty</div>
                              <div class="line">And want of wisdom, you, that best should teach us,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have misdemean'd yourself, and not a little,</div>
                              <div class="line">Toward the king first, then his laws, in filling</div>
                              <div class="line">The whole realm, by your teaching and your chaplains,</div>
                              <div class="line">For so we are inform'd, with new opinions,</div>
                              <div class="line">Divers and dangerous; which are heresies,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, not reform'd, may prove pernicious.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">Which reformation must be sudden too,</div>
                              <div class="line">My noble lords; for those that tame wild horses</div>
                              <div class="line">Pace 'em not in their hands to make 'em gentle,</div>
                              <div class="line">But stop their mouths with stubborn bits, and spur 'em,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till they obey the manage. If we suffer,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of our easiness and childish pity</div>
                              <div class="line">To one man's honour, this contagious sickness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell all physic: and what follows then?</div>
                              <div class="line">Commotions, uproars, with a general taint</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the whole state: as, of late days, our neighbours,</div>
                              <div class="line">The upper Germany, can dearly witness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet freshly pitied in our memories.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">My good lords, hitherto, in all the progress</div>
                              <div class="line">Both of my life and office, I have labour'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">And with no little study, that my teaching</div>
                              <div class="line">And the strong course of my authority</div>
                              <div class="line">Might go one way, and safely; and the end</div>
                              <div class="line">Was ever, to do well: nor is there living,</div>
                              <div class="line">I speak it with a single heart, my lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">A man that more detests, more stirs against,</div>
                              <div class="line">Both in his private conscience and his place,</div>
                              <div class="line">Defacers of a public peace, than I do.</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray heaven, the king may never find a heart</div>
                              <div class="line">With less allegiance in it! Men that make</div>
                              <div class="line">Envy and crooked malice nourishment</div>
                              <div class="line">Dare bite the best. I do beseech your lordships,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, in this case of justice, my accusers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be what they will, may stand forth face to face,</div>
                              <div class="line">And freely urge against me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SUFFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">That cannot be: you are a counsellor,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, by that virtue, no man dare accuse you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GARDINER</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, because we have business of more moment,</div>
                              <div class="line">We will be short with you. 'Tis his highness' pleasure,</div>
                              <div class="line">And our consent, for better trial of you,</div>
                              <div class="line">From hence you be committed to the Tower;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where, being but a private man again,</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall know many dare accuse you boldly,</div>
                              <div class="line">More than, I fear, you are provided for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRANMER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, my good Lord of Winchester, I thank you;</div>
                              <div class="line">You are always my good friend; if your will pass,</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall both find your lordship judge and juror,</div>
